function.name: getData
function.description: Returns a byte array with the content of this attachment.
function.summary: Returns a byte array with the content of this attachment.

function.name: getMimeType
function.description: Returns the Mime type of this attachment.
function.summary: Returns the Mime type of this attachment.

function.name: getName
function.description: Returns the name of this attachment.
function.summary: Returns the name of this attachment.

function.name: isEmbedded
function.description: Returns true if this attachment is embedded, false otherwise. Attachments become embedded if they are references through tags from the body text of the message.
function.summary: Returns true if this attachment is embedded, false otherwise.

function.name: getAttachments
function.description: Returns an array of Attachment instances corresponding to the attachments of this message.
function.summary: Returns an array of Attachment instances corresponding to the attachments of this message.

function.name: getCCAddresses
function.description: Returns a String with all addresses present in the CC field of this message.
function.summary: Returns a String with all addresses present in the CC field of this message.

function.name: getFromAddresses
function.description: Returns a String with all addresses present in the From field of this message.
function.summary: Returns a String with all addresses present in the From field of this message.

function.name: getHeaders
function.description: Returns a String with all headers of this message.
function.summary: Returns a String with all headers of this message.

function.name: getHtmlMsg
function.description: Returns a String with the HTML content of this message.
function.summary: Returns a String with the HTML content of this message.

function.name: getPlainMsg
function.description: Returns a String with the plain content of this message.
function.summary: Returns a String with the plain content of this message.

function.name: getReceivedDate
function.description: Returns a Date instace corresponding to the moment when the message was received.
function.summary: Returns a Date instace corresponding to the moment when the message was received.
function.deprecated: No longer supported. Try using #getHeaders() for approximate results.

function.name: getRecipientAddresses
function.description: Returns a String with all addresses in the To field of this message.
function.summary: Returns a String with all addresses in the To field of this message.

function.name: getReplyAddresses
function.description: Returns a String with all addresses in the Reply-To field of this message.
function.summary: Returns a String with all addresses in the Reply-To field of this message.

function.name: getSentDate
function.description: Returns a Date instance corresponding to the moment when this message was sent.
function.summary: Returns a Date instance corresponding to the moment when this message was sent.

function.name: getSubject
function.description: Returns a String with the subject of this message.
function.summary: Returns a String with the subject of this message.

function.name: createBinaryAttachment
function.description: Creates a binary attachment object.
function.summary: Creates a binary attachment object.

function.name: createBinaryAttachment
function.description: Creates a binary attachment object.
function.summary: Creates a binary attachment object.

function.name: createTextAttachment
function.description: Creates a text based attachment objec with the default 'text/plain' mimetype
function.summary: Creates a text based attachment objec with the default 'text/plain' mimetype

function.name: createTextAttachment
function.description: Creates a text based attachment object.
function.summary: Creates a text based attachment object.

function.name: getLastSendMailExceptionMsg
function.description: Get the exception that occurred in the last sendMail attempt (null if no exception occurred).
function.summary: Get the exception that occurred in the last sendMail attempt (null if no exception occurred).

function.name: getMailMessage
function.description: Helper method, returns MailMessage object from binary or 7bits string.
function.summary: Helper method, returns MailMessage object from binary or 7bits string.

function.name: getPlainMailAddresses
function.description: Helper method to only get the plain addresses.
function.summary: Helper method to only get the plain addresses.
function.sample: var plainArray = plugins.mail.getPlainMailAddresses('John Cobb <from_me@example.com>,Pete Cobb<from_pete@example.com>'); application.output(plainArray[0]) //will return 'from_me@example.com'

function.name: isValidEmailAddress
function.description: Checks whether the given e-mail address is valid or not.
function.summary: Checks whether the given e-mail address is valid or not.
function.sample: plugins.mail.isValidEmailAddress("me@example.com");

function.name: receiveMail
function.description: Receive mails from pop3 account.
function.summary: Receive mails from pop3 account.

function.name: receiveMail
function.description: Receive mails from pop3 account.
function.summary: Receive mails from pop3 account.

function.name: receiveMail
function.description: Receive mails from pop3 account.
function.summary: Receive mails from pop3 account.

function.name: receiveMail
function.description: Receive mails from pop3 account.
function.summary: Receive mails from pop3 account.

function.name: receiveMail
function.description: Receive mails from pop3 account.
function.summary: Receive mails from pop3 account.

function.name: senBulkdMail
function.description: Send a bulk mail, if you make the msgText start with <html> the message will be sent in html (and you can use all html formatting). A bulk email makes it possible for one to not receive "out of office" emails back from receiver.
function.summary: Send a bulk mail, if you make the msgText start with <html> the message will be sent in html (and you can use all html formatting).

parameter.name: to
parameter.description: A string containing 1 or multiple addresses seperated by a comma.

parameter.name: from
parameter.description: A string containing an address and an optional reply address, seperated by a comma.

parameter.name: subject
parameter.description: The subject of the bulk mail

parameter.name: msgText
parameter.description: The message text

parameter.name: cc
parameter.description: One or more addresses seperated by a comma

parameter.name: bcc
parameter.description: One or more addresses seperated by a comma

parameter.name: attachments
parameter.description: The attachments

parameter.name: overrideProperties
parameter.description: An array of properties

function.name: sendBulkMail
function.description: Send a bulk mail, if you make the msgText start with <html> the message will be sent in html (and you can use all html formatting). A bulk email makes it possible for one to not receive "out of office" emails back from receiver.
function.summary: Send a bulk mail, if you make the msgText start with <html> the message will be sent in html (and you can use all html formatting).

parameter.name: A
parameter.description: string containing 1 or multiple addresses seperated by a comma.

parameter.name: from
parameter.description: A string containing an address and an optional reply address, seperated by a comma.

parameter.name: subject
parameter.description: The subject of the bulk mail

parameter.name: msgText
parameter.description: The message text

function.name: sendMail
function.description: Send a mail, if you make the msgText start with <html> the message will be sent in html (and you can use all html formatting).
function.summary: Send a mail, if you make the msgText start with <html> the message will be sent in html (and you can use all html formatting).

parameter.name: to
parameter.description: A string containing 1 or multiple addresses seperated by a comma.

parameter.name: from
parameter.description: A string containing an address and an optional reply address, seperated by a comma.

parameter.name: subject
parameter.description: The subject of the mail

parameter.name: msgText
parameter.description: The message text
